intro: Kanimia oblongifolia, commonly known as the narrow-leaf kanimia, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its elongated, narrow leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories. Kanimia oblongifolia is valued for its ornamental appeal and has been used in traditional medicine in some regions.
